Initialized(uint8).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

getBorrowRateAtRatio(address,address,uin.details: returns the Rate for the chosen borrowable at the specified leverage ratio and supply amount

getBorrowableMarketsAndRates(address).details: returns lists of the market addresses, names, symbols and the current Rate for each Borrowable asset

getCollateralMarkets().details: returns lists of the market addresses, names and symbols of the underlying assets of those collateral markets that are whitelisted

getBorrowRateAtRatio(address,address,uin.notice: this is a lens fn, it is not intended to be used on-chain

getBorrowableMarketsAndRates(address).notice: this is a lens fn, it is not intended to be used on-chain

getCollateralMarkets().notice: this is a lens fn, it is not intended to be used on-chain

getNetAPY(uint256,uint256,address,addres.notice: this is a lens fn, it is not intended to be used on-chain
